Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What was that, fellas?

Speaker: pilot
Dialogue: Clear-air turbulence, is all. Nothing SERIOUS

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Sure -- my pleasure.

Speaker: pilot
Dialogue: Wow. Call Westchester Approach, see what they've got.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I sure hope we don't have to turn back. I mean this is first day of training camp, I wouldn't want to be LATE --

Speaker: pilot
Dialogue: Seat-belt time.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Maybe it'd be smoother if you went HIGHER --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Will you SHUT UP?  Look, Mister Flash Gordon, they have their hands full -- just let 'em drive.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: When you're nervous, it can help to chew on something

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Thanks a lot -- I look dumb enough to take candy from a stranger?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I'm not a stranger exactly -- You know my name.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Who doesn't. Number one draft pick, cover of PEOPLE mag -- what'd the GIANTS sign you for, eighty-nine million? Big deal!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Of course.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: God, I hate flying -- I'm Dale Arden it's crazy of me to hate flying -- I'm a travel agent, you see? -- I've just been checking out a little hotel in Vermont -- can I still have that candy bar?  Are we going backward?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Backwards?

Speaker: tv newsman
Dialogue: The extraordinary weather disturbances reported from Africa this morning are now crossing the Atlantic, and are expected to reach the East Coast of the United States by noon. According to scientists at NASA, the Earth is being struck by an immense stream of cosmic energy, apparently the result of some catastrophic stellar accident beyond the reaches OF --

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Fools! Can't you understand? This is no accident-- it's an ATTACK! An attack planned by a MIND! This is ATTACK!

Speaker: munson
Dialogue: Dr. Zarkov! Look at the report from the last balloon!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: I predicted it, didn't I?

Speaker: munson
Dialogue: Yes, sir -- you sure did. And this funny sun too ---

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Ozone layer starting to crack up. By tonight Carbon dioxide will be combining with free nitrogen to form --  Well, this is it.

Speaker: munson
Dialogue: Sir, the President is on the TV behind YOU --

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: What the hell do I care? I tried to warn him -- he called me mad, like all the others.

Speaker: munson
Dialogue: Go where?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Up. Up and at him.

Speaker: munson
Dialogue: You're crazy!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: I can't handle the capsule alone get your toothbrush.

Speaker: pilot
Dialogue: What's ,e word from Westchester Approach, Bill?

Speaker: pilot
Dialogue: On the left, about six o'clock high......

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Can you fly it?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I can fly all right -- I've had a couple of lessons! -- just don't if I can land!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Oh boy! Ever hear about the man who fell ninety stories from a window and didn't break a bone?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: No but I'd sure like to! How'd The man fall ninety stories didn't break a bone?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: The window was ninety-one stories up!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Brace yourself I'm aiming at that field up ahead!

Speaker: zarkov's voice
Dialogue: I see you, Munson! Come out or I shoot!

Speaker: munson
Dialogue: So what's it matter if I'm shot or go up in that thing? I'm a goner either way, right?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Of course -- I admit that! But this way you'll be giving your life for a chance of saving Earth! Haven't you any spirit at all??

Speaker: munson
Dialogue: Goodbye, Doctor -- they were all right about you. Have a nice trip.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: I tell you I can't take it off alone! If you won't come, who will I find?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Dale! Are you all right?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: I'm terrific.  Flash Gordon, you have just made me a Giant fan for life.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Come on -- let's get out before she blows!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Hello. i'm Flash Gordon, this is Miss Dale Arden --

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Delighted to see you.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: This crazy storm knocked us down could we use a phone?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Certainly. Just follow me -- up those stairs.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Some weather huh?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: It will get worse.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: You're Dr. Hans Zarkov!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: How did you know?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: I saw you in PEOPLE mag. After you left NASA, remember? It said you were utterly ---

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Insane? Off my rocker?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: I forget what it said:  Flash, let's find some other phone, okay? I'm sure Dr. Zarkov is very busy.......

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Well, all right -- but it seems to me we ought to --

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Up the stairs to the tower! Ahead of me -- quick! --  Quick I said: We haven't much time -- Earth is being attacked! -- there's only one slim chance of saving it!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Mister, you are insane!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Up the stairs -- RUN!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Go with the flow -- wait for a chance!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: I need your help to take off! Get in or I shot you dead!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Take off for where?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: God only knows -- whatever black corner of space this is coming from -- wherever HE is!. -- we'll plunge into the devil's heart and destroy him! We'll die ourselves, of course, but our names will be honored till the end of time!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Look, Doc -- I don't book kamikaze tours -- never.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Sit down there! Foot on the red pedal!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash! Sack him!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: By God, we did it! We made it!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Made it where, Doctor?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: I don't know.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Don't. Suddenly I like it in here just fine --

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Hello -- my name's Flash Gordon -- can you understand me?  We're from EARTH -- we come as friends.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Extend your hand! That's the gesture of friendship known everywhere!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Hi!

Speaker: leader
Dialogue: You are prisoners. I will take you now to Ming the Merciless, Ruler of the universe!

Speaker: armored men
Dialogue: Hail, Ming!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Thanks, Doctor -- next time I'll call my own play.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Just do what I'm doing. Flash --

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What are you doing?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Shutting my eyes -- dreaming I booked us to Disneyland.

Speaker: armored men
Dialogue: Hail, Ming! Hail, Great One Without Mercy!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Fantastic -- into a Black Hole and out the other side -- to this. Who said Hans Zarkov was mad?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: You're mad.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: You got us into this -- HOW DO WE GET OUT?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Get out? Why? We're being taken to Ming -- getting at him is our only hope of saving EARTH. It's perfect!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Dr. Zarkov, I'm about to show you what it feels like to be clipped by a New York Giant --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash, it's no use - he's too crazy!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Step forward, Soldier.

Speaker: armored man
Dialogue: Gladly!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Fall on your sword.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: You inhuman fiend!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Of course I'm "inhuman"! -- that's a compliment!  Pathetic Earthlings, forever wondering if you are alone in the universe -- beaming you plaintive messages into to the void for anything that might hear you -- even hurling your bodies out into it -- and all without the faintest inkling of who or what is out here. If you had known anything -- anything at all about the true nature of the universe, you would have hidden from it, in terror!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Watch it, fella -- you came with me!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: You know who Ming is now -- who are you and why do you come to Mongo?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I'm Flash Gordon of the New York Giants this is Dale Arden -- Dr.Zarkov hijacked us in an effort to save EARTH.

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: Sirs, Earth is the meaningless planet you are in the process of obliterating.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: In the process? You mean Earth still exists?

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: For the moment -- not for much longer.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: But why? What in hell have we ever done to hurt you?

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: You exist -- and yet you pay no homage to Ming! What greater crime can be committed?

Speaker: voices
Dialogue: Hail, Ming! Hail, Great One Without Mercy!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Come closer, Dale Arden -- let me see you.

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: This woman will amuse you.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Klytus can see the future, eh?

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: He can foresee it -- but for a few moments only. It gives him a unique gift for survival, -- and treachery.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Extraordinary. I'd like to study his beta factors -- I wager I could extend them with a course of telekinetic exercise.  Tell me -- when you use this fit does your temporal lobe prickle? Here?

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Chain this one up. Preserve him for further examination.

Speaker: leader
Dialogue: Hail, Ming!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Oh no you don't! We came together and we're STAYING together!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: That one is useless to us. Remove him and kill him.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: You dirty old bastard can kill me too!

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Don't kill him yet, Father. Give him to me!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: What would your Prince Barin say?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: I can handle Barin.

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Really, Aura -- your appetites are too monstrous -- even for our family. This could cause great trouble with Barin -- I must forbid it.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: But you adore me, Father -- you ca refuse me nothing . Yes?

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Take the Earth-woman to our quarters! Bathe and annoint her for our pleasure!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: My God -- and I thought that book was another rip-off-

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Watch out! Behind you!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: What's the play, Flash?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I can't -- I just can't --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Can't what?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Clobber a woman, Dale --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: You damn fool, those aren't women they're murderous AMAZON DYKES!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash!!

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: She betrays you! She'll take him to Aboria!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: So Prince Barin will kill Flash Gordon for me -- I don't care.

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: Don't be too sure!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: I haven't taken a wife in centuries. I could bring myself to marry this Dale Arden --  What do you see in her future, Klytus?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Take a deep breath! Grab my ankle after we hit the water -- I'll lead you!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Hit what water?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Catch your breath -- then I'll take you up and find you a disguise.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: You're saving my life. How can I Thank you?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: I'll fly you to the forest of Arboria - we'll find a way.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Let's get one thing straight -- I've got to find Dale and that nut Zarkov too -- rescue them and try to save Earth too.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Do you realize how foolish you are to tell that to me -- Ming's daughter?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I'm no good at lying.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: You're funny -- are all Eathlings like you, Flash Gordon?

Speaker: plash
Dialogue: I guess I'm about average.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: You can't reach him. If a soldier spots you, it's instant death! -- Come!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Incredible - the very core of this planet, is it not?

Speaker: soldier
Dialogue: We are but soldiers. We do not know.

Speaker: ming's voice
Dialogue: You guess well, Dr. Zarkov!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: I am forcing this plasma through the successive nuclear phases of a star - building it toward the apocalyptic moment that will end Earth's pathetic history in one flash of fire.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Devil! Why don't you turn this science to peaceful use? The name Ming would be blessed instead of cursed.

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Bring him up to the dome, Soldiers -- we wish to show him wonders.

Speaker: everyone
Dialogue: Hail! Ming! Hail, Great one Without Mercy!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Listen, where's he got Dale?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Forget Dale Arden!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I can't! I mean I hardly know her, BUT --

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Forget her, Flash Gordon: I saw a look in my father's eye -- I think he intends to marry her.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What?? Marry her? What are you talking about??

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Oh you ask so many questions.  I'm taking you to people who'll help you. Trust me!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Can I honestly?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Trust me!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Here we are where?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: I've dressed you as a Royal Pilot, First Class. We'll slip into my personal car and you'll fly it.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Those are ROCKET SHIPS in there! I can't fly a damn rocket ship!

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Learn from me -- I'll teach you so much!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Earth!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Yes, Zarkov -- as it was. Now as it will be, when my plasma reaches full force.....

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: But that's impossible! Even your perverted genius can't create new life!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Of course I can create life. There's nothing easier. It only requires myself and one woman.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Dale Arden.....

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Who else? As in that childish myth of yours -- Adam and Eve, wasn't it? I will breed with her and repopulate the Earth in my own image. I've already done it on over a thousand planets.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Monster!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Return him to the dungeon.

Speaker: hedonia
Dialogue: Drink this.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: What is it -- some rotten drug?

Speaker: hedonia
Dialogue: It has no name. But many brave men died to bring it across space from Cythera, planet of Pleasure. It will make your hours with Ming more agreeable.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash! Where are you??

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Frigia -- eleventh of the moons of Mongo. It's inhabited by the Bear Men who eat their own young...

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Some lucky people live on that one too?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Of course - the Sand Men. Every Moon is a kingdom -- seperate and hostile to all the others. They have nothing in common but Ming's rule -- and their hatred of him.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Why don't they team up and fight him?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Fight Ming the Merciless?  You saw what happened to the Lizard Men.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Sue -- but that wasn't a team effort.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: I don't know these words what's a "team"?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Why?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Because he does anything I ask. He loves me.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: You can really transfer your thoughts with that? Like I could get in touch with Dale?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: If I showed you how.  But I'm not going to.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Please.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: What are you doing?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Are you mad> We're diving straight at Ardentia!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: That's right, Princess  and we're not pulling out until you put that gadget over my head and tune me in to Dale Arden!

Speaker: hedonia
Dialogue: Rub this on your body. It gives Ming pleasure.

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Dale, it's me -- Flash! Am I with you?

Speaker: hedonia
Dialogue: What's the matter?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: I'm dreaming.

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: No, Dale -- you're not dreaming I'm Flash -- I'm with you and you are with me!

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Are you receiving my thoughts?

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: I'm receiving something --

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: Where are you Flash?

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Speeding for the Kingdom of Arboria to get help! I'm in a spacecraft with Aura, Ming's daughter!

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: What? That bitch? Don't trust her! She's after you!

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Listen, she means nothing to me -- not a darn thing. Where are you, Dale?

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: Naked in a bathtub.

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Oh God -- if I could only see you, Dale. If I could touch you -- what are you in a tub for?

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: I'm being fixed up for Ming.

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: Chained in a dungeon, I think. What'll I do, Flash?

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: How?

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Just fake 'em out, Dale -- girls know how. But don't go too far. I mean get to Zarkov and release him, I'll have help by then -- I'll find you. Can you do all that?

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: Sounds like fourth down and about ninety yards to go, but I'll try.

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Dale, you're some girl -- God, you really are.  Do you get what I'm thinking now?

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: Oh yes.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Enough!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Sorry. I guess landings aren't my thing.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Where's Robin Hood?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Who?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: It doesn't matter. How do we get down.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Follow me.

Speaker: serving girl
Dialogue: He is coming to see you now. Are you ready?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Very.

Speaker: serving girl
Dialogue: Do you need any more of this?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: No, thanks. Just turn down the light a bit, would you? I'm shy.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: Serving Girl - what business have you in this dungeon?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Listen -- are you sure this Barin will help me?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Ssssh...... Trust me!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: It's amazing -- I dreamed of this tree-house when I was a kid --

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: It's Barin's hunt! Watch!

Speaker: tree man
Dialogue: Barin got him!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: These are the guys who are gonna help me?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: It means nothing. They only shout that because it's treason not to. They hate Ming.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: I scent a Tiger Man near the lodge! Form battle lines above and below!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I know just how he feels -- we played the Pittsburgh Steelers last year.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Not him! Bring him back for sport:

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Go inside -- let me talk to Barin first.  Foolish Earthling - trust me!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Aura!

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: It's so long since I've been with you, Barin -- I couldn't stand it. Please don't be too angry at me for coming.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Angry at you?

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: You'll stay the night?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: I've dreamed of it!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Get me a sword --  This is the fiercest Tiger Man we have ever hunted. I'm going to kill him now -- and dedicate his blood to you, my beloved.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: But that's treason! Blood can be dedicated to Ming alone!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: I know you, Aura -- the more a man risks, the greater your passion. If I knew a greater risk, I'd take it.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Flash Gordon -- come out!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I'm from Earth, Prince Barin. My friends and I were Ming's prisoners. She kindly brought me here to enlist your help.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: What in hell? My help?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Hide him from my father -- don't let him wander -- keep him for me!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Keep me for.....????  Oh, my god. I trusted you.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: You still must -- I'm playing a game!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: What? What are you saying?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: He's a mere toy to me, my love -- when I'm tired of it we'll kill him!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: I'll hide him, all right -- under six feet of Arborian dirt!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I'm not your enemy, Prince Barin. we share a hatred of Ming

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Are you so afraid of my Earthling, Barin; Won't you even give him a chance?

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Snake keeper! Rouse your beast!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: I did him a mercy. This venom brings death only after long tortured madness. Your turn, Earthling.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I think I'll pass on this one.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: There are six openings to the serpent. Five are safe -- the sixth is death. Choose one -- or take your end from my sword here and now.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Would you give Dale a message from me? Tell her I'm sorry how things have panned out -- I Loved her.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: I'll do that.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What the hell? Forget it. Sending that message by you is like sending a lettuce-leaf by a rabbit.

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: If your love for me is great enough, Barin, surely it will protect you from the serpent -- no?

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Go again.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What are you waiting for?

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Fooled you, didn't I?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: It's an even chance now, Flash Gordon -- that's better than Daddy would have given you --

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Boy. You oughta be handled with a forked stick yourself.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: If I were you, I'd choose the sword --

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Maybe I was wrong -- surely the Prince of Arboria wouldn't be beaten by a toy.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: The hunt's on, my Tree Men!

Speaker: tree men
Dialogue: To the hunt with Barin!

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: Thank you for freeing me.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: You can speak?

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: For all the good it does me.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Have we a chance, Tiger Man?

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: Only if we climb -- out of the green light -- to the sky -- Prince Barin's Tree Men can't follow us up there!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What do you mean?

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: Ming's Law -- outside his own kingdom, every hunter becomes the hunted!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Damn. End of the line.

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: I don't know --no man has ever been above the green.

Speaker: tree man
Dialogue: The sight -- call came from the left!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Up and across we'll cut them off!

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: What is that color above?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Blue. We call is blue.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Which way to the border:

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: Legend says Arboria ends in an ocean to the west.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: I saved you because your death must be mine.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What's the point of all this killing? Why don't we team up and overthrow Ming?

Speaker: aura's voice
Dialogue: Princess Aura returns to Mingo City The passage through the force-field opens at her approach --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Will it fly?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Basic circuits seem okay.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: It has-to fly! We gotta rescue FLASH from that vampire before she --

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Jump!!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: What happened?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Heaven knows. I was just starting to test the primary transformer-banks AND ----

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: My God -- your hands! Your hands are gone!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Not gone -- Just invisible. See?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Does it hurt?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Not a bit. I believe Mongo's gravitational. field must have reversed the polarity of my generator so that --

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: Mongo is restless today. Your vessels stray from their appointed kingdoms....

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: That damned Vultan -- time I clipped his wings once and for all. We could put those insolent Hawkmen of his to work in the plasma cavern ----

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: Dale Arden and Flash Gordon? Will I send out the Imperial Fleet to bring them back?

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: We'll let Vultan tame her first -- I'll look pretty to Dale Arden after him. Flash Gordon is nobody.

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: Sire, it is not for me to tell Great, Ming that he is making mistakes.

Speaker: hawkman
Dialogue: Want us to let you go, et?

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: Yes!!

Speaker: hawkman
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: Nooo!!!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Watch out, you old bird -- Ming wants to marry me.

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Ho! -- Barin! - I knew my Hawkmen would catch you one of these days.

Speaker: sarin
Dialogue: Be careful how you address me, Vultan. I am Prince Barin, ruler of Arboria.

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Not in my Kingdom -- here you're just a stray animal to be killed for our sport!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Will you do that, Vultan?

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: What would you do if you'd caught me in Arboria?

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Yes -- I would hunt you down and kill you without mercy.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Hello - we do meet in the strangest places.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Where's Dale?

Speaker: zaakov
Dialogue: The boss-bird has her up in his

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash! Oh darling!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Dale baby!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash -- when I was in that tub --

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Yes -- it was me --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Did you mean it?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Every thought, baby! --

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: No. What have you to say to Vultan, Prince of the Air?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: We're all Ming's prisoners. I say let's team up and smash him.

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: You're a leader, he?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Well, back home it's what I'm paid for -- I called a pretty good game against the Dallas Cowboys once ---

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Do you understand him?

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Not a word.  I was hunting him when you seized me. Before you finish me. Vultan I beg only that you let me finish him.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Oh god -- here we go again --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Is everyone on Mongo CRAZY? Haven't you guys ever heard of TEAMWORK?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: When I had that damn snake in my hand, I could've poked it in your face and KILLED you.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: I had you in bow-sight you were dead!

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Enough!  These vagrants talk a brave fight, my Hawkmen! Shall we test their words?

Speaker: hawkpeople
Dialogue: Test them! -- Let's have sport! The joust! -- To the joust! --

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Take them below -- put them together.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash - don't do this.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I've got to.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Why?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: He has no choice, Dale it's the Mongo way.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: I'm so homesick -- what I wouldn't give for a nice quiet night with some muggers in Central Park --

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Prepare them!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash!!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Ready for me, Earthling?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I ask you to swear, Barin -- if you defeat me, you'll join Vultan against Ming! If for no other reasons, because you'll never have Aura as long as her father lives!-

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: What do you now of Aura?

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Quite a lot!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash, I love you! Win for me, Flash!??

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: You've won, Earthling! Drop him to doom!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Try to catch my wrist! -- the other one.

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: What is this??

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Call it what you want, Vultan -- compassion -- mercy: let us teach you the meaning of these words.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Swing your body -- see if you can get a leg up here!

Speaker: ming's voice
Dialogue: Vultan! Hear Ming, Ruler of the Universe!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: I see you, Vultan -- and Barin too! You both have defied we by sparing these Earthlings!

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Barin -- my only -- I swear I didn't mean to get you into this!

Speaker: ming's voice
Dialogue: Do you want to live, Vultan?

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: What creature wants to die?

Speaker: ming's voice
Dialogue: Then kill Flash Gordon now! Pick up Dale Arden, deliver her to me on your own wings -- it's your only chance! My fleet is already in the air, ready to destroy your whole Kingdom if you disobey!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: What'll you have -- death or dishonor?

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: We'll save these Earthlings! - Curse Ming! -- Into the air, my Hawkpeople - fly!

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Spare him Daddy -- oh please spare BARIN --

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: You've always wanted her, Klytus -- Aura is yours.

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Don't look back, Hawkman. Head for that cloud-cover!  Where's this capsule of yours, exactly?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: In the high grass east of Mingo.

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Pick it up, Captain!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Guess the first thing you and me are gonna do after we land..!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Darling not in front of the Hawkmen -- you'll make me blush! --

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Gonna do it first thing -- around here, never know if you'll get another chance!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Help!!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: I'm coming, Dale!  Follow her -- climb!

Speaker: hedonia
Dialogue: Time is short. Ming sent me to fit you with is.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Fit me with what?

Speaker: hedonia
Dialogue: Your wedding dress.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: A force-field covers the whole city, from here to here. With luck, Flash can lure them into lowering their defenses.

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: What if he fails?  This is suicide, Barin! I can't order my men to suicide!

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Ming destroyed your kingdom!

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: We'll build another.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Vultan!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Let him go -- I understand.  Thanks anyway for getting us this far!

Speaker: zarkov's voice
Dialogue: Flash! Ready for a test!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What's the game-plan?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Sit there. When I give you zero, punch that button. Any questions?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Five, four, three, two, one -- ZERO!

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Not unless you get out of my way, I CAN'T --

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: Look -- he still casts a shadow:

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Prisoners of Ming, you are surrounded! The creature who moves is obliterated!

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: We'll find vultan later. Where's Flash Gordon?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: His Hawkman dropped him. He's dead.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Nooo -- it's not true!

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: It is -- they saw him fall a mile into the glaciers of Frigia.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Oh Flash -- no -- you can't be dead -- it doesn't make any sense --

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: When I think of being given to Klytus, I wish it was myself who had fallen.

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: I don't believe you. You -- you awful Mongo person -- you were born without a heart:

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Then what is it that melts into my eyes, Dale Arden? Feel it breaking --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: You poor kid -- don't you have a MOM to talk to?

Speaker: aura
Dialogue: Ming tired of her. He blew my Mother into outer space. I look into the night sky sometimes and wonder what star she's orbiting --

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: God, Aura -- no wonder you've had problems -- that bastard:

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Well? What is it this time?

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: I can't remember. I feel danger -- but I cannot see it.

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Klytus, you're impossible. Aura deserves you.

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: I foresee another thing. In one minute exactly, the Earthling space capsule will be seen on the scanner.

Speaker: captin
Dialogue: Shall I disintegrate it, Your Majesty?

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: No, Captain -- bring it in. Land it to a warm reception.

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Vultan! Do you read me?

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Flash Gordon calling Vultan! Over!

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: He calls us crazy --

Speaker: guard captain
Dialogue: It's empty!

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: guard captain
Dialogue: Unmanned. Must've taken off on some automatic program.

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: Destroy it.

Speaker: soldier
Dialogue: Third elevator down, turn left!  Who is that?

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: I am the ghost of all the good men murdered by Ming! Prepare for doom!

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: I'm looking at it now -- wait for your turn.

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: It's me!

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: How do we get down to the plasma level?

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Anti-gravity shaft -- I got a guard to show me --

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: This won't be easy, Flash --

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Nothing's easy on Mongo --

Speaker: guard captain
Dialogue: Faster! -- More fueld!

Speaker: controller
Dialogue: What's the hurry?

Speaker: guard captain
Dialogue: He wants to give Dale Arden the final destruction of Earth as a wedding present.

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: How's it look to yoU?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Bad. Plasma's contracting into a critical mass. When that needle hits the red, Earth is finished.

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: Grrao! I'll charge down at them:

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Cavern is sealed tight -- every door locked from the inside --

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Let's face it, my friends -- without a miracle, we've lost.

Speaker: hawkman captain
Dialogue: All right -- I see the towers lined up now as Flash Gordon said --

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Through the force-field, my Hawkmen! The pass is narrow -- dive three-by- three! Any man who wishes to turn back may do so!

Speaker: hawkman captain
Dialogue: They must have one hell of a little PLANET --

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: In range.

Speaker: hawkman captain
Dialogue: It's a trap! The passage is covered!

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Onward, Hawkmen! Dive! We outnumber their arrows -- overwhelm them!

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: Man the battlements!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: You have the ring?

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: In my pocket.

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: Your Majesty, we're under attack by Hawkmen!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: So what are you doing down here, coward? Why aren't you in the fray?

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: Sire, I thought you'd --

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Mingo City is impregnable! I'm not about to put off wedding Dale Arden for this!

Speaker: hawkman captain
Dialogue: What's for us after this lot?

Speaker: vultan
Dialogue: Ming!

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: The cavern first! Gotta get Zarkov in there to --

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: I can't watch any more. To think of all our history ended this way -- the incredible ascent from primordial slime to Albert Einstein and Dale Arden and --

Speaker: tiger man
Dialogue: Look!

Speaker: high priest
Dialogue: Do you take her, this Earthling, Dale Arden, to be your Empress of the hour? Do you solemnly promise to use her as you will -- not discard her until such time as you grow weary of her?

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: I do.

Speaker: high priest
Dialogue: The wedding ring, please --

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: With this ring, I thee wed!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash!!!

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: Run!!!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Seal this hall! Close every portal!

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Where did you get that sword?

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: From the crystal block.

Speaker: ming
Dialogue: Impossible! It could only be pulled by my rightful heir!

Speaker: flash's voice
Dialogue: How about that?

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Attach the electrodes to the shovels! Pitch them into the plasma!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Flash -- look out -- you're coming back! He can see you now, Flash!

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: I foresaw at blow --

Speaker: barin
Dialogue: You're blinded, Klytus -- drop your sword!

Speaker: klytus
Dialogue: You fight me in vain, Barin I do not foresee my death at your hands --

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Cross your fingers, boys!

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: Look -- Earth!

Speaker: dale's voice
Dialogue: Oh it's so beautiful!

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: What's the matter, darling?

Speaker: dale
Dialogue: We saved Earth but we lost the capsule -- we'll never get home again.

Speaker: flash
Dialogue: Zarkov is right.

Speaker: zarkov
Dialogue: Shouldn't you fellows be leaving on your honeymoon?
